speech: They hope for ease; they hope for comfort; they hope the challenge ends just as they anticipate.  But hope is not a strategy for greatness.
asr_speech: They hope for ease. They hope for comfort. They hope the challenge ends just as they anticipate, but hope is not a strategy for greatness.
